sen.j: 御蔭通（みかげどおり）は、京都市左京区内の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Mikage-dori Street is one of the east and west street in Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Mikage-dori Street is a street running east-west through Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Mikage-dori Street is a street running east-west through Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東は志賀越道から西は下鴨神社南西の下鴨本通、下鴨中通との交差点まで。
sen.e: It runs from Shigagoemichi at east, and Shinogamohon-dori Street which is the south and east side of Shimogamo Jinja Shrine at west to the crossing at Shimogamonaka-dori Street.
It runs from Shigagoemichi in the east, and Shinogamohon-dori Street which is on the south east side of Shimogamo Jinja Shrine in the west to a crossing at Shimogamonaka-dori Street.
It runs from Shigagoemichi road in the east, and Shimogamohon-dori Street which is on the south east side of Shimogamo-jinja Shrine in the west to a crossing at Shimogamonaka-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Shigagoemichi road, Shimogamo-jinja Shrineとし、下鴨本通のスペルミスを修正

sen.j: 今出川通と北大路通の間にある中程度の幹線で京都市バスも運行される。
sen.e: It's a middle size highway between Imadegawa-dori Street and Kitaoji-dori Street that Kyoto City bus also runs.
It is a middle sized highway between Imadegawa-dori Street and Kitaoji-dori Street which is used by Kyoto City buses.
It is a middle sized highway between Imadegawa-dori Street and Kitaoji-dori Street which is used by Kyoto City buses.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペースを削除

sen.j: 京都府道・滋賀県道30号下鴨大津線とも称される志賀越道は御蔭通から南西は一方通行の狭い道路になるため、御蔭通が白川通、東大路通からのアクセスを担う。
sen.e: Shigagoemichi which is also called Kyoto/Shiga Prefectural Road 30 Shimogamo-Otsu Line, it takes access from Shirakawa-dori Street and Higashioji-dori Street because it become narrow one-way street to south and east from Mikage-dori Street.
sen.cmt: 京都府道滋賀県道30号下鴨大津線→Kyoto/Shiga Prefectural Road 30 Shimogamo-Otsu Line[定訳不明]
sen.e: For Shigagoemichi which is also called Kyoto/Shiga Prefectural Road 30 Shimogamo-Otsu Line, access is gained through Shirakawa-dori Street and Higashioji-dori Street because it becomes a narrow one-way street south-west from Mikage-dori Street.

For Shigagoemichi road which is also called Kyoto/Shiga Prefectural Road 30 Shimogamo-Otsu Line, access is gained through Shirakawa-dori Street and Higashioji-dori Street because it becomes a narrow one-way street south-west from Mikage-dori Street.

sen.j: 交差点名は北白川仕伏町。
sen.e: The crossing name is Kitashirakawa-Shibusecho
The intersection name is Kitashirakawa-Shibusecho
The intersection name is Kitashirakawa-Shibusecho

sen.j: 白川通との交差点（北白川別当町）を経て京都大学北部キャンパス（グラウンド、農学部実験農場）あたりまでは大学教授などの多く住む住宅地。
sen.e: The area from the crossing at Shirakawa-dori Street (Kitashirakawa-Bettocho) to around the Kyoto University, North Campus is the residential area where many professors live.
The area from the intersection at Shirakawa-dori Street (Kitashirakawa-Bettocho) to around Kyoto University, North Campus is a residential area where many professors live.
The area from the intersection at Shirakawa-dori Street (Kitashirakawa-Bettocho) to around Kyoto University, North Campus is a residential area where many professors live.

sen.j: 東大路との交差点（田中里の前）、さらに叡山電鉄を渡り、高野川 (京都市)を御蔭橋でわたれば賀茂御祖神社（下鴨神社）の糺の森の南を画す。
sen.e: There is the divided line for the north of Tadasu-no-mori at Kamo Mioya Jinaja Shrine (Shimogamo Jinja Shrine) which goes to the crossing at Higashioji-dori Street (Tanakasatonome), and across the Eizan Electric Railway, then across the Takano River on Mikage-dori Bridge.

A line divides the north of Tadasu-no-mori at Kamo Mioya Jinaja Shrine (Shimogamo Jinja Shrine) and continues onward to the intersection at Higashioji-dori Street (Tanakasatonome), and across the Eizan Electric Railway, then across the Takano River on Mikage-dori Bridge.

A line divides the north of Tadasu no Mori forest at Kamo Mioya-jinja Shrine (Shimogamo-jinja Shrine) and continues onward to the intersection at Higashioji-dori Street (Tanakasatonomae), and across the Eizan Electric Railway, then across the Takano River on Mikage-dori Bridge.
sen.cmt: 糺の森→Tadasu no Mori forestとし、「賀茂御祖神社」、「田中里の前」のスペルミスを修正、Kamo Mioya-jinja Shrine, Shimogamo-jinja Shrineとしました。

tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に修正

sen.j: 交差する道路の特記がないものは市町村道。
sen.e: The crossing street without signs belongs to municipality's street.
Intersecting streets without signs belong to the city.
Intersecting streets without signs belong to the city.

tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に修正

sen.j: 日本バプテスト病院 志賀越道西北
sen.e: The Japan Baptist Hospital
The Japan Baptist Hospital
The Japan Baptist Hospital: northwest of the Shigagoemichi road

sen.j: 京都大学北部キャンパス（グラウンド、農学部実験農場）
sen.e: Kyoto University, North Campus (ground, experiment farm for faculty of agriculture).
Kyoto University, North Campus (ground, experiment farm for faculty of agriculture).
Kyoto University, North Campus (ground, experiment farm for faculty of agriculture)

sen.j: 叡山電鉄叡山本線 - 元田中駅 東大路通上ル
sen.e: Eizanhonsen Line, Eizan Electric Railway - Mototanaka Station: Higashioji-dori Street agaru
Eizanhonsen Line, Eizan Electric Railway - Mototanaka Station: Higashioji-dori Street agaru
Eizanhonsen Line, Eizan Electric Railway - Mototanaka Station: Higashioji-dori Street agaru

sen.j: 京都府警察 下鴨警察署 川端通下ル
sen.e: Kyoto Prefectural Police Shimogamo Police Station: Kawabata-dori Street sagaru
Kyoto Prefectural Police Shimogamo Police Station: Kawabata-dori Street sagaru
Kyoto Prefectural Police Shimogamo Police Station: Kawabata-dori Street sagaru

sen.j: 賀茂御祖神社（下鴨神社）
sen.e: Kamo Mioya Jinja Shrine (Shimogamo Jinja Shrine)
Kamo Mioya Jinja Shrine (Shimogamo Jinja Shrine)
Kamo Mioya-jinja Shrine (Shimogamo-jinja Shrine)
